doc.title: Milk and Honey
doc.plot: Maddie and Pete seem perfect for each other: she's a waitress, he's a Hibachi chef. Their obsession with food extends from the daily grind to the bedroom. But is it enough? Maddie wants more - and thinks that maybe Pete is holding her back. Carol chose a future as a professional university professor twenty years ago, yet she teaches the poetry of the man she left behind. When he turns up again, she is given another chance - but will love rekindle? Milk & Honey is the story of two romances that cross paths.
